function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Propagation of human coronavirus 229E in human lung fibroblast MRC-5 cell line","Impact":"Potential release of infectious virus particles","Mitigation":"Use of appropriate containment protocols and biosafety measures","Technologies":"Biological safety cabinets, personal protective equipment, air filtration systems","People":"Laboratory workers, researchers, and staff","Owner":"Laboratory management and biosafety officers"},{"Description":"Storage of HCoV 229E stocks at -80°C","Impact":"Risk of accidental exposure and release of the virus","Mitigation":"Strict storage protocols, regular monitoring, and use of secure containment methods","Technologies":"Freezers with secure locks, temperature monitoring systems, access control systems","People":"Laboratory technicians, facility management, biosafety officers","Owner":"Laboratory management and biosafety officers"},{"Description":"Enumeration of HCoV 229E viral stocks using TCID50 technique","Impact":"Potential aerosolization of virus particles during enumeration process","Mitigation":"Use of appropriate containment measures, engineering controls, and personal protective equipment","Technologies":"Biological safety cabinets, fume hoods, HEPA filters, protective clothing","People":"Laboratory technicians, researchers, and staff","Owner":"Laboratory management and biosafety officers"}]}
